entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 12:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -24.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
